news.title: Principal tells of sadness at loss of ‘vibrant and much loved pupils’ in Fermanagh murder-attempted suicide
news.summary: The school of two children killed in a suspected Fermanagh murder-attempted suicide have told of their sadness and loss of the “vibrant and much valued pupils”.

news.title: Company at centre of listeria outbreak appoints former FSAI chief as consumers told not to eat meals affected
news.summary: Ballymaguire Foods at the centre of a major foods recall due to listeria concerns, said it’s “deeply aware that people have been impacted by consuming its freshly prepared meals,” as the company appoints a public health expert to lead a response.

news.title: Wrestling icon Hulk Hogan dead at 71 after 'suspected cardiac arrest'
news.summary: Hulk Hogan, a mustachioed, headscarf-wearing icon in professional wrestling who turned the sport into a massive business and cultural touchstone, died Thursday at age 71, Florida police said.

news.title: Father of Kirsty Ward ‘very disappointed’ by 15-year sentence handed down to her killer boyfriend
news.summary: The father of Kirsty Ward, an Irish woman who was murdered in a Spanish hotel two years ago, has revealed the Spanish Public Prosecutor is appealing the sentence handed down to her former boyfriend.

news.title: Eilis O'Hanlon: 'Are we really meant to believe that Kat Slater, with the vaguest of employment histories, could buy the Queen Vic?'
news.summary: The Queen Vic went up for auction in ­ EastEnders this week. The pub in Albert Square has been the scene of some of the soap’s most iconic moments.

news.title: Team Ineos soigneur David Rozman leaves Tour de France amid 2012 doping questions raised by Sunday Independent
news.summary: A team soigneur, or carer, for Ineos Grenadiers has left the Tour de France after being asked to speak to the International Testing Agency (ITA) over allegations relating to the 2012 season, the British team said on Thursday.

news.title: Oliver Callan: Why a lovely local Pride has me agreeing with Denis O’Brien on expelling flaky foreign investors
news.summary: It seems only yesterday that I was reading rage letters from his lawyers about mean things I said about him on the telly. Now he’s talking sense. Mentally high-fiving Big Dinny is like a Monaghan man shouting for Cavan at an Ulster final – ’tis unnatural.

news.title: Garda guilty of assaulting teenager (17) in Temple Bar
news.summary: A garda has been convicted of assaulting a teenager in Temple Bar four years ago, following a trial at Dublin Circuit Criminal Court.

news.title: This Working Life: 'I grew up in Tallaght with five brothers and a sister. There were no legal contacts in my family'
news.summary: I recently turned 50, but wasn’t too bothered about it.

news.title: Why this year’s ‘Love Island’ highlights everything I hate about dating in the real world
news.summary: Reality TV should do exactly what it says on the tin – reflect reality. If it can’t, then what is the point of watching?
